title: Bronshtein and Semendyayev
summary: Bronshtein and Semendyayev (often just Bronshtein or Bronstein,[4][3][5] sometimes BS) is the informal name of a comprehensive handbook of fundamental working knowledge of mathematics and table of formulas originally compiled by the Russian mathematician Ilya Nikolaevich Bronshtein and engineer Konstantin Adolfovic Semendyayev.
